beer.beer_description:
NEW BEER - KATIPŌ (5.2%) – NEW ZEALAND PILSNER 
Named after NZ’s only venomous spider – an endangered, almost mythical species – this is a new-world lager with some bite! ?️⁠
⁠
She’s crawling with hops straight from the land of the long white cloud ☁️. The rare Riwaka has a distinct punch; it’s the most expensive hop we’ve ever used due to its scarcity, from a small-town dedicated to growing the hop. Meanwhile, Nelson Sauvin, so called for its Sauvignon Blanc flavours like gooseberry and passionfruit, brings a complexity akin to a good glass of Aeteora white. Together, these heavy-hitters front a uniquely sharp pilsner with a firm bitterness and all the crispness you’d expect, plus tropical notes, citrus and spice to boot.⁠

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 475 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 360 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 73!

items.badge_description: Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 20 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_description:
Hoppy International Beer Day!

Beer serves as the common thread that links us worldwide, possessing the ability to bring people together in a unique way.

Beer has played a significant role in shaping countless of our most cherished memories. And if there’s one thing we’ve learned along the way, beer is best when shared with others.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 270 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 55!

Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 165 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 34!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 65 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 14!

Ready, set, gold! Are you ready for a Podium Party?!?

At Untappd, we love checking in beers (some say for sport), and this year, there's an easy way to earn your spot on the podium.
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 45 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 10!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 420 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 85!

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.
